title: OAF inner loop
description: This loop extends the compound loop to take you to the OAF office, via the road which is West of it.

title: Compound loop
description: This is shortest loop, when going left then right from the compound.

title: OAF outer loop
description: This is a loop that circles around OAF and goes back to the compound via the main Ikonyero road.

title: Countryside and C40 loop
description: A nice loop going North of the OAF office and ending up at the gas station at the entrance of Kakamega, on the C40 road.
